text: The Embassy of the United Kingdom in Mexico City is the chief diplomatic mission of the United Kingdom in Mexico. The Embassy is located on Río Lerma in the Colonia Cuauhtémoc neighbourhood. The current British Ambassador to Mexico is Corin Robertson. ==See also== *Mexico-United Kingdom relations *List of diplomatic missions in Mexico *List of Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Mexico ==References== United Kingdom Mexico City Category:Buildings and structures in Mexico City Category:Cuauhtémoc, Mexico City Category:Mexico–United Kingdom relations
title: Embassy of the United Kingdom, Mexico City
